title: Watering Tips
description: Water your plants only when the top soil feels dry. Overwatering is the #1 reason indoor plants die. Always use a pot with drainage holes.

title: Sunlight Tips
description: Most indoor plants love bright indirect sunlight. Keep them near windows, but avoid harsh direct sunlight for long hours as it can burn leaves.

title: Fertilizing Tips
description: Use fertilizer once every 2 to 4 weeks during spring and summer. Avoid fertilizing in winter when plants grow slowly.

title: Pruning & Cleaning
description: Trim dead leaves regularly to encourage new growth. Wipe leaves with a damp cloth to remove dust and help the plant absorb more light.
